info.description:
.. image:: https://login.whatap.io/static/whatap_logo.png


.. _WhaTap: https://www.whatap.io/

WhaTap_ for python
==================
Whatap allows for application performance monitoring.
python version : 3.3.x / Django Application.


Installation
------------
  .. code:: bash

    $ pip install whatap



Usage
------------
1. set configuration.

  .. code:: bash

    $ export WHATAP_HOME=[application_path]
    $ whatap-config-license [xxx] # set license
    $ whatap-config-host [xxxx] # set host
    $ whatap-python # start whatap agent
    $ whatap-python-kill # down whatap agent

2. import whatap in your application.

  .. code:: python

    import whatap
    whatap.agent()


- ex) wsgi.py

  .. code:: python

    import os
    os.environ.setdefault("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE", "whatapserver.settings")

    *import whatap*
    *whatap.agent()*

    from django.core.wsgi import get_wsgi_application
    application = get_wsgi_application()


3. how to module hooking?

  .. code:: python

    import whatap
    whatap.hooks()


- ex) manage.py

  .. code:: python

    os.environ.setdefault("DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE", "whatapserver.settings")

    *import whatap*
    *whatap.hooks()*

    from django.core.management import execute_from_command_line

    execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)
